languages.text: "Да и сами небось помните, что со мной было, когда Тервантьяс силы мои запер. Еще чуть-чуть, и мозги совсем в кашу превратились бы".

traits.locale_text: "Да и сами небось помните что со мной было, когда Тервантьяс силы мои запер. Еще чуть-чуть и мозги совсем в кашу превратились бы".

languages.text: "Besides, you don't need stories to remember what happened to me when Tervantias blocked my powers. Just a bit longer, and my brains would've been mush."
languages.original_text: "Да и сами небось помните, что со мной было, когда Тервантьяс силы мои запер. Еще чуть-чуть, и мозги совсем в кашу превратились бы".

traits.locale_text: "Hells, you don't need stories to remember what happened to me when Tervantias blocked my powers. Just a bit longer, and my brains would've been mush."
"Hells, you don't need stories to remember what happened to me when Tervantias blocked my powers. Just a bit longer, and my brains would've been mush."
"Hells, you don't need stories to remember what happened to me when Tervantias blocked my powers. Just a bit longer, and my brains would've been mush."
"Hells, you don't need stories to remember what happened to me when Tervantias blocked my powers. Just a bit longer, and my brains would've been mush."
"Besides, you don't need stories to remember what happened to me when Tervantias blocked my powers. Just a bit longer, and my brains would've been mush."

languages.text: “另外，我还记得特万提亚斯打算压抑我的力量时候，我的身体发生了什么事情。那玩意儿要是多戴一段时间，我的脑子估计已经变成肉糊了。”
languages.original_text: "Besides, you don't need stories to remember what happened to me when Tervantias blocked my powers. Just a bit longer, and my brains would've been mush."

traits.locale_text: “真要命，我还记得特万提亚斯打算压抑我的力量时候，我的身体发生了什么事情。那玩意儿要是多戴一段时间，我的脑子估计已经变成肉糊了。”

languages.text: «En fin, tampoco es que necesite que le recuerde lo que pasó cuando el condenado Tervantias bloqueó mis poderes. De haber durado un poco más, mi cerebro se habría convertido en papilla».
languages.original_text: "Besides, you don't need stories to remember what happened to me when Tervantias blocked my powers. Just a bit longer, and my brains would've been mush."

traits.locale_text: «En fin, tampoco es que necesite que le recuerde lo que pasó cuando el condenado Tervantias bloqueó mis poderes. De haber durado un poco más, mi cerebro se habría convertido en papilla».

languages.text: "Außerdem braucht Ihr doch keine Geschichten, um Euch daran zu erinnern, was mit mir geschehen ist, als Tervantias meine Kräfte blockiert hat. Ein wenig länger und mein Gehirn wäre zu Brei geworden."
languages.original_text: "Besides, you don't need stories to remember what happened to me when Tervantias blocked my powers. Just a bit longer, and my brains would've been mush."

traits.locale_text: "Bei den Höllen, Ihr braucht doch keine Geschichten, um Euch daran zu erinnern, was mit mir geschehen ist, als Tervantias meine Kräfte blockiert hat. Ein wenig länger und mein Gehirn wäre zu Brei geworden."

languages.text: 「それに、テルヴァンティアスにパワーを封じられた時のことは、思い出すのもおぞましいことよ。あの時、あたいの脳みそはあと少しでグチャグチャになるところだったのだと思うわ」
languages.original_text: "Besides, you don't need stories to remember what happened to me when Tervantias blocked my powers. Just a bit longer, and my brains would've been mush."

traits.locale_text: 「それに、テルヴァンティアスにパワーを封じられた時のことは、思い出すのもおぞましいことよ。あの時、あたいの脳みそはあと少しでグチャグチャになるところだったのだと思うわ」

languages.text: « De plus, il est inutile que je vous rappelle ce qui m'est arrivé quand Tervantias a bloqué mes pouvoirs. Il s'en est fallu de peu pour que mon cerveau soit réduit en bouillie ! »
languages.original_text: "Besides, you don't need stories to remember what happened to me when Tervantias blocked my powers. Just a bit longer, and my brains would've been mush."

traits.locale_text: « Par les Enfers, il est inutile que je vous rappelle ce qui m'est arrivé quand Tervantias a bloqué mes pouvoirs. Il s'en est fallu de peu pour que mon cerveau soit réduit en bouillie ! »

languages.text: "Ayrıca Tervantias güçlerimi engellediğinde olanları hatırlamak için hikâyelere ihtiyacım yok. Biraz daha sürseydi beynim haşat olacaktı."
languages.original_text: "Besides, you don't need stories to remember what happened to me when Tervantias blocked my powers. Just a bit longer, and my brains would've been mush."

traits.locale_text: "Ayrıca Tervantias güçlerimi engellediğinde olanları hatırlamak için hikâyelere ihtiyacım yok. Biraz daha sürseydi beynim haşata dönecekti."
